languages.text: "Остановись, ксенос! Разве ты не обещал убить лишь девчонку и тех, кто станет на ее защиту?"

traits.locale_text: "Остановись, ксенос! Разве ты не обещал убить лишь девчонку и тех, кто станет на ее защиту?"

languages.text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

languages.text: 「やめろ、異種族！護衛ともども、この少女を殺さず生かしておくという約束じゃなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: 「やめろ、異種族！護衛ともども、この少女を殺さず生かしておくという約束じゃなかったのか？」

languages.text: “住手，异形！你不是答应过，说要杀了那个女孩和保护她的人，放过剩下的人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: “住手，异形！你不是答应过，说要杀了那个女孩和保护她的人，放过剩下的人吗？”

languages.text: « Arrêtez, xénos ! N'aviez-vous pas promis de tuer la fille et ses protecteurs, mais d'épargner les autres ? »
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez, xénos ! N'aviez-vous pas promis de tuer la fille et ses protecteurs, mais d'épargner les autres ? »

languages.text: «¡Alto, xenos! ¿No prometisteis que solo mataríais a la niña y a sus protectores, sin herir al resto?».
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto, xenos! ¿No prometisteis que solo mataríais a la niña y a sus protectores, sin herir al resto?».

languages.text: "Halt, Xenos! Habt Ihr nicht versprochen, dass Ihr das Mädchen sowie ihre Beschützer töten und den Rest verschonen würdet?"
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: "Halt, Xenos! Habt Ihr nicht versprochen, dass Ihr das Mädchen sowie ihre Beschützer töten und den Rest verschonen würdet?"

languages.text: "Durun zenolar! Kızı ve koruyucularını öldürüp geriye kalanların canını bağışlayacağınıza söz vermemiş miydiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Stop, xenos! Didn't you promise that you would kill the girl along with her protectors and spare the rest?"

traits.locale_text: "Durun zenolar! Kızı ve koruyucularını öldürüp geriye kalanların canını bağışlayacağınıza söz vermemiş miydiniz?"
